data.title: On Time Agency Welcomes NBA Veteran Charlie Villanueva as Partner and Special Advisor — On Time Agency
data.meta_description: Read how On Time Agency is redefining sports management with the addition of former NBA star Charlie Villanueva as Partner and Special Advisor. Explore the impact of their player-driven approach, designed to empower athletes on and off the court.
data.text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE --

Atlanta, GA - May 14, 2024 — On Time Agency is exhilarated to announce that former NBA player Charlie Villanueva is joining the team as a Partner and Special Advisor. With over 15 years of friendship and mutual respect, Charlie and CEO & Founder, Ramon Sessions, share a vision for empowering athletes beyond their sports careers.

Charlie brings a wealth of experience to the table, with an extensive career in basketball and subsequent success in real estate and investment. His insights and leadership are expected to significantly enhance the agency’s innovative player-driven model. This partnership underscores On Time Agency's commitment to providing athletes with the necessary tools to succeed both during and after their careers.

“I'm hype to announce that I'm joining On Time,” said Charlie Villanueva. “My journey has always been about building a legacy that empowers and uplifts others. Together with my former teammate and long-time friend, Ramon Sessions, we are super committed to ensuring every athlete has the tools they need for success, on and off the court. From our days on the court to this new chapter as partners, our mission remains clear: to champion a player-driven approach that puts athletes first in every play.”

On Time, with the addition of Charlie, anticipates a future where the agency not only supports athletes in their professional endeavors but also prepares them immediately for successful careers and lives beyond sports. Drawing on insights from sources who have "walked the talk," such as the very own transitions of Charlie, Ramon, and Ticha Penicheiro, On Time is uniquely positioned to guide athletes through their journeys with genuine understanding and proven strategies.
